page.title: 17Marldon, Church and Chapel
page.content: Marldon has 2 religious buildings. The {Chapel on the Hill}is a member of the United Reform Church and has about 40 members. There is a service every Sunday. The Minister comes from Babbacombe. {Marldon Church of England church} has about 180 members. About 90 people go to church every Sunday but the church is packed at Christmas and Easter. The Vicar is an Australian, Revd.Grant Brockhouse, who is very fond of English church music. The church has a choir and bells which are rung in the tower every Sunday and for weddings People are buried in the churchyard. The people of the church run the annual village pantomime, and started a neighbours care group to look after the elderly and sick.The Church prints a parish magazine with news of all the village activities.
